categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A young member of the Jedi Order was active around 3703 BBY, when the crown prince of the planet Alderaan was arranged to marry a daughter of the noble House Organa. However, the Jedi discovered that the girl was in fact a member of House Thul, having been switched at birth with an Organa infant, and stopped the wedding by exposing the deception. The Jedi's revelation ultimately saw House Thul exiled for their treachery.

The Jedi involved in the Thul scandal was first mentioned in the House Thul Codex entry in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, though the Jedi's name, species, and gender were unspecified.
